title: Virtual Conversation: Suzan Frecon—The Experience of the Painting
hero_caption: Left: Suzan Frecon. vermilion mummy, 2020. Right: Suzan Frecon. hot, and dark lumiere, 2020. Photo by Suzan Frecon.
short_description: Artist Suzan Frecon discusses her career and work.
list_description: Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art
description:
Suzan Frecon (American, born 1941) is known for abstract oil paintings and works on paper that—as she describes her lifelong practice—“speak for themselves.” Made over long stretches of time, her work embodies the durational activity of painting itself and invites the viewer’s sustained attention: these, she says, “are not pictures that you look at. They are paintings that you experience."

Frecon discusses the experience of the painting in this virtual conversation.

Presented by the Society for Contemporary Art and made possible with the support of Prada
